author: brane
msg: Describe the WinXP TCP/IP bug that causes data corruption.
* INSTALL: New section "Platform-Specific Issues". Describe WinXP TCP bug.

author: brane
msg: Generate build_neon.bat after checking for BDB libs.
code that generates build_neon.bat after the BDB library search, and

author: brane
msg: I was becoming really fed up with having to fiddle with build_neon.bat
every time I build from a release tarball, and even more so of "svn st"
showing that file as modified just because I build neon with zlib and
and changed into a template that conditionally defines ZLIB_SRC and
options, and generate build_neon.bat from the template.
* build/win32: Add build_neon.bat to the svn:ignore list.
* gen-make.py: Add --with-zlib and --with-openssl to the getopt list.
